title: Horse
credit_line: Bequest of Mr. and Mrs. James H. Beal
provenance_text:
John B. Flannagan [1895-1942]; Sam Lewisohn; Sidney Simon [1]; Zabriskie Gallery, New York, NY, by December 1966; Mr. [1898-1987] and Mrs. [1898-1993] James H. Beal, Pittsburgh, PA, December 22, 1966 until February 14, 1987 [2]; Mrs. James H. Beal (born Rebecca Huebley Jones), Pittsburgh, PA, until April 23, 1993; bequest of Mr. and Mrs. James H. Beal to Carnegie Museum of Art, Pittsburgh, PA, February 1994.

Notes:
[1]. The early provenance is taken from hand-written information on the back of a photo of the sculpture by John D. Schiff, New York, NY, the source of which is apparently the Zabriskie Gallery. A note by Mrs. Beal in the curatorial file repeats the same provenance prior to Zabriskie Gallery. 
[2]. The sculpture was purchased from the Zabriskie Gallery for $2800 (see curatorial file for purchase information from the Beal files.)

creator.birth_place: Fargo (Cass county, North Dakota, United States)
creator.death_place: New York City (New York state, United States)
